Summary: Flaming object moving south to north.
divs: Sighting DetailsLAST NIGHT 4TH OF JULY JUST WHEN ALL THE FIREWORKS WERE GOING OFF I WALKED TO THE 7-11 AT PECOS AND LAKE MEAD BLD. ON MY WAY BACK I GOT A CALL FROM MY BROTHER AND HE SAID TO LOOK IN THE EASTERN SKY THERE WAS A GLOWING OBJECT. I SAW IT HEADING NORTH OVER NELLIS AIRFORCE BASE MY BROTHER WATCHED IT FROM HEBDERSON IN THE SOUTH MOVE TO THE NORTH.I SEEN IT MOVING SLOWLY FOR A LARGE OBJECT. WICH REMINDED ME OF A ROCKET STAGE SEPERATING WHEN YOU SEE THE FLASH.IT WAS ORANGE FLAMING LIKE A PLASMA BURST OROUND IT THAT HAPPENED A COUPLE OF TIMES THEN IT WAS TO FAR TO SEE ANYMORE.I WANT YOU TO CHECK THE RADAR IN THIS AREA IT SEEMED TO GO RIGHT OVER NELLIS AIRFORCE BASE MAYBE MORE TO THE EAST OF THE BASE. SOUTH TO NORTH AT THAT TIME.I LOOKED AT MY PHONE CLOCK IT SAID 9:36 SO A FEW MINUTES BEFORE THAT.
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in North Las Vegas
There were no other sightings in North Las Vegas on or around July 4th 2009
